title: Is my pronunciation of Al Fatiha valid? - Assim al hakeem
transcript: i prayed for somewhere between four to seven days where i recited surah fatiha like this now i switched back to my regular way which sounds like this so do i have to redo those prayers which i did in that four to seven day period and if so no there is no there is no difference muhammad they are all the same the words are the same the pronunciation is the same the meaning has not changed so you're okay with that okay thank you barakallahu you
